comment: Rajdhani express 😂. Chhota packet bada dhamaka. Thanks for being a person jisko irritate karne me bahut maza aata hai😂
name: Riya

comment: Best of luck for everything. Be happy and have fun.
name: Samrat Telse

comment:
Civil Gawd mujhe bolti aur mere se double number le aati hai 🦈🦈. Itne number ka karegi kya🥹🥹? 
Jokes apart best of luck for your future bas number thode kam kar lena baki logon ka bhala ho jayega 🙏🏻🙏🏻.
name: Ayush

comment: Absolutely focused in civil core. Hope you achieve everything in future. You should try some non acad activities too. Stay happy and connected.
name: Akshat Nahata

comment: Tumse jalta nahi hu. Thanks for inspiring me with ur hardwork and solid focus towards studies and the confidence that u have within yourself. Congo in advance for silver medal. ATB for future endeavors. Aur thoda dehhre chala kar.🚅🚅🚅🚅
name: Sanskar Gupta
